verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֑ת <S%H5058><s%> on Neginoth מִזְמ֖וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> [or] Song נוֹדָ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> known בִּֽיהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> In Judah אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> [is] God בְּ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> his name
וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> is in בְשָׁלֵ֣ם <S%H8004><s%> In Salem סֻכּ֑וֹ <S%H5520><s%> also is his tabernacle וּמְע֖וֹנָת֣וֹ <S%H4585><s%> and his dwelling place בְצִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> in Zion

שָׁ֭מָּה <S%H8033><s%> There שִׁבַּ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> There brake רִשְׁפֵי־ <S%H7565><s%> he the arrows קָ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> of the bow מָגֵ֬ן <S%H4043><s%> the shield וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and the sword וּמִלְחָמָ֣ה <S%H4421><s%> and the battle סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
נָ֭אוֹר <S%H215><s%> Thou [art] more glorious אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you אַדִּ֗יר <S%H117><s%> [and] excellent מֵֽהַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> than the mountains טָֽרֶף׃ <S%H2964><s%> of prey

אֶשְׁתּוֹלְל֨וּ ׀ <S%H7997><s%> are spoiled אַבִּ֣ירֵי <S%H47><s%> strong לֵ֭ב <S%H3820><s%> care for נָמ֣וּ <S%H5123><s%> they have slept שְׁנָתָ֑ם <S%H8142><s%> their sleep וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> could מָצְא֖וּ <S%H4672><s%> have found כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and none אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> and none of the men חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> of might יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> their hands

מִ֭גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ <S%H1606><s%> At thy rebuke אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> O God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob נִ֝רְדָּ֗ם <S%H7290><s%> are cast into a dead sleep וְרֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> both the chariot וָסֽוּס׃ <S%H5483><s%> and horse

אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> You נ֥וֹרָא <S%H3372><s%> Thou [even] thou [art] to be feared אַ֗תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> and who יַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> and who may stand לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> in thy sight מֵאָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> when אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H639><s%> anger

מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven הִשְׁמַ֣עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> to be heard דִּ֑ין <S%H1779><s%> Thou didst cause judgment אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth יָֽרְאָ֣ה <S%H3372><s%> feared וְשָׁקָֽטָה׃ <S%H8252><s%> and was still

בְּקוּם־ <S%H6965><s%> arose לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> to judgment אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> When God לְהוֹשִׁ֖יעַ <S%H3467><s%> to save כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַנְוֵי־ <S%H6035><s%> all the meek אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For חֲמַ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> Surely the wrath אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> of man תּוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <S%H3034><s%> shall praise שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> thee the remainder חֵמֹ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> of wrath תַּחְגֹּֽר׃ <S%H2296><s%> shalt thou restrain

נִֽדֲר֣וּ <S%H5087><s%> Vow וְשַׁלְּמוּ֮ <S%H7999><s%> and pay לַיהוָ֪ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵ֫יכֶ֥ם <S%H430><s%> your God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all סְבִיבָ֑יו <S%H5439><s%> let all that be round about יוֹבִ֥ילוּ <S%H2986><s%> him bring שַׁ֝֗י <S%H7862><s%> presents לַמּוֹרָֽא׃ <S%H4172><s%> unto him that ought to be feared

יִ֭בְצֹר <S%H1219><s%> He shall cut off ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit נְגִידִ֑ים <S%H5057><s%> of princes נ֝וֹרָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> [he is] terrible לְמַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> to the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth
